column4: Howdy, I am going to set up ubuntu or GOS Rocket linux on a usb drive and run it off the usb drive.  How long will the USB drive last?  will I burn it up in a month?  it will get a couple hours of use a day on the web, e-mail and thats about it.
depending on what make and model of drive you have, it will refuse to boot in about 2-4 months
do you know a brand or model that will last longer?
could buy a usb 2.0 PCI card and put it in his computer!
